name: SportsNewsMinuteFlashBriefingandDailyUpdate
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Popular sports blog Larry Brown Sports scours the web looking for the top trending and viral sports news stories and presents them every day in a short, compact minute-long sports news audio update. More than just the games and scores, we let you know about the rumors and what's happening off the field, as well as what the top newsmakers and playmakers are saying. The Sports News Minute is unlike anything else.

NFL and football-related stories are covered in the trending sports news update. That includes stories about adjacent leagues like the XFL and even CFL. Free agency, rumors, trades, salaries, and moves are all topics for exploration. Teams like the Dallas Cowboys, New England Patriots, Pittsburgh Steelers, Oakland Las Vegas Raiders, Green Bay Packers, Minnesota Vikings, Detroit Lions, Chicago Bears, New York Jets, Miami Dolphins, Buffalo Bills, Baltimore Ravens, Cleveland Browns, Cincinnati Bengals, Tennessee Texans, Indianapolis Colts, Tennessee Titans, Jacksonville Jaguars, Los Angeles Chargers, Kansas City Chiefs, Denver Broncos, Philadelphia Eagles, Washington Redskins, Giants, New Orleans Saints, Atlanta Falcons, Carolina Panthers, Tampa Bay Buccaneers, Rams, Seattle Seahawks, San Francisco 49ers and Arizona Cardinals. Top players Tom Brady, Ben Roethlisberger, Antonio Brown, Johnny Manziel, Tim Tebow, Peyton Manning, Rob Gronkowski, Aaron Rodgers, Tony Romo, Cam Newton, Dez Bryant, Bill Belichick, Ezekiel Elliott, Dak Prescott receive attention.

The NBA is a year-round league in terms of coverage. Whether it's the summer league, preseason, offseason, in-season, or playoffs, LBS is on top of it. LeBron James, Kevin Durant, Kawhi Leonard, Paul George, Dwyane Wade, Russell Westbrook, James Harden, Zion Williamson, Blake Griffin, Joel Embiid, Anthony Davis are top playmakers. Coverage includes the Golden State Warriors, Lakers, Clippers, Heat, Knicks, Hawks, Boston Celtics, Brooklyn Nets, Charlotte Hornets, Bulls, Cavaliers, Pistons, Indiana Pacers, Milwaukee Bucks, Orlando Magic, 76ers, Toronto Raptors, Wizards, Mavericks, Nuggets, Rockets, Memphiis Grizzlies, Pelicans, Oklahoma City Thunder, Phoenix Suns, Portland Trail Blazers, Sacramento Kings, San Antonio Spurs and Utah Jazz. Charles Barkley, Lonzo Ball, LaVar, Big Baller Brand, and Michael Jordan. Coaches Steve Kerr, Gregg Popovich. Executives Magic Johnson and owner Mark Cuban.

MLB and other baseball stories receive coverage. Big-time plays, trades and moves are always at the forefront. Mike Trout, Alex Rodriguez, Derek Jeter, Justin Verlander, Yasiel Puig, Manny Machado, Aaron Judge, Shohei Ohtani, MVPs like Christian Yelich and Giancarlo Stanton. Yankees, Rays, Red Sox, Blue Jays, Orioles, Minnesota Twins, Indians, White Sox, Royals, Tigers, Astros, A's, Texas Rangers, Angels, Mariners, Braves, Nationals, Phillies, Mets, Marlins, St. Louis Cardinals, Cubs, Brewers, Reds, Pirates, Dodgers, Diamondbacks, Padres, and Colorado Rockies.

College football and basketball. Top teams Ohio State Buckeyes, Michigan Wolverines with Jim Harbaugh, Alabama Crimson Tide led by Nick Saban, Clemson Tigers with Dabo Swinney, USC Trojans, Auburn Tigers, LSU, Ole Miss, Georgia Bulldogs, Nebraska Cornhuskers, Oklahoma Sooners and Lincoln Riley, Texas Longhorns and Tom Herman, Notre Dame Fighting Irish, Florida Gators, Washington Huskies, Penn State Nittany Lions, Oregon Ducks, Wisconsin Badgers, Michigan State Spartans, Tennessee Volunteers, Arkansas Razorbacks.

Sports like boxing, MMA, UFC, Bellator get mentions. Fighters such as Manny Pacquiao, Floyd Mayweather, Conor McGregor. Golf and golfers Tiger Woods, Rory McIlroy, Brooks Koepka, Rickie Fowler. Tennis and top players Roger Federer, Novak Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, Serena Williams, Venus, Maria Sharapova.

League news, rules and suspensions from Roger Goodell, Adam Silver, Rob Manfred and Gary Bettman. Business, sales of teams, sponsorship deals. Twitter, Instagram and Facebook news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
